analysis.key_quote: reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F will politicize the NIH and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and its potential negative impact on the NIH's ability to function effectively in identifying future cures, which aligns with a defense of the current merit-based system.
